title: Zone Interdite
resume: Zone interdite is a French newsmagazine that has been broadcast since March 7, 1993 on M6, the second-most watched TV network in the French-speaking world. Well known for its investigative journalism, the show has long been considered one of the most influential in France and has been awarded the 7 d'or for best newsmagazine on TV. It is currently presented by Wendy Bouchard.
